sections.title: Chorus
content: Trust and obey, for there's no other way
To be happy in Jesus, But to trust and obey

sections.title: Verse 1
content: When we walk with the Lord in the light of His word
What a glory He sheds on our way!
While we do His good will,
And with all who will trust and obey

sections.title: Verse 2
content: Not a shadow can rise, not a cloud in the skies.
But His smile quickly drives it away;
Not a doubt or a fear, not a sigh nor a tear
Can abide while we trust and obey

sections.title: Verse 3
content: Not a burden we bear, not a sorrow we share
But our toil He doth richly repay
Nor a grief nor a loss, not a crown or a Cross,
But is blest if we trust and obey

sections.title: Verse 4
content: But we never can prove the delight His love
Until all on the altar we lay
For the favour He shows and the joy He bestows
Are for them, who will trust and obey
